ConnectionRefused.why: MongoDB server is not running, wrong host/port, or network issue
fix: Start MongoDB service: mongod or systemctl start mongod
Verify connection string (host, port) is correct
Check if MongoDB is listening on expected port (default: 27017)
Test connection with mongosh or MongoDB Compass

AuthenticationFailed.why: Wrong username/password or user doesn't have required permissions
fix: Verify username and password in connection string

SchemaValidationError.what: Document doesn't match collection schema validation rules
SchemaValidationError.why: Data violates schema constraints (required fields, types, patterns)
fix: Check which field failed validation in error message
Verify field types match schema (string, number, date, etc.)
Check field value constraints (min/max, pattern, enum)
